entries: You spray toxic mist at a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d12} Poison damage.
entries_es: Usted rocía la niebla tóxica en una criatura dentro del rango. Haga un ataque de hechizos contra el objetivo. En un golpe, el objetivo toma {@damage 1d12} Daño de veneno.

spells.name: Polymorph
entries: You attempt to transform a creature that you can see within range into a Beast. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or shape-shift into Beast form for the duration. That form can be any {@filter Beast|bestiary|type=beast|miscellaneous=!swarm} you choose that has a {@variantrule Challenge Rating|XPHB} equal to or less than the target's (or the target's level if it doesn't have a {@variantrule Challenge Rating|XPHB}). The target's game statistics are replaced by the stat block of the chosen Beast, but the target retains its alignment, personality, creature type, {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, and {@variantrule Hit Point Dice|XPHB}.

The target gains a number of {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} of the Beast form. These {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} vanish if any remain when the spell ends. The spell ends early on the target if it has no {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} left.
The target is limited in the actions it can perform by the anatomy of its new form, and it can't speak or cast spells.
The target's gear melds into the new form. The creature can't use or otherwise benefit from any of that equipment.
entries_es: Intentas transformar una criatura que puedes ver dentro del rango en una Bestia. El objetivo debe tener éxito en un lanzamiento de ahorro de Sabiduría o cambio de forma en forma de Bestia durante el tiempo. Esa forma puede ser cualquier [[TAG0] que elija que tiene un {@variantrule Challenge Rating|XPHB} igual o inferior al del objetivo (o el nivel del objetivo si no tiene un {@variantrule Challenge Rating|XPHB}). Las estadísticas de juego del objetivo son reemplazadas por el bloque de puestos de la Bestia elegida, pero el objetivo conserva su alineación, personalidad, tipo de criatura, {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, y {@variantrule Hit Point Dice|XPHB}.

El objetivo gana un número de {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} iguales al {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} de la forma Bestia. Estos {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} desaparecen si alguno permanece cuando el hechizo termina. El hechizo termina temprano en el objetivo si no se queda {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}.
El objetivo está limitado en las acciones que puede realizar por la anatomía de su nueva forma, y no puede hablar o lanzar hechizos.
El equipo del objetivo se funde en la nueva forma. La criatura no puede usar ni beneficiarse de ningún equipo.

spells.name: Power Word Fortify
entries: You fortify up to six creatures you can see within range. The spell bestows 120 {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}, which you divide among the spell's recipients.
entries_es: Fortificas hasta seis criaturas que puedes ver dentro del rango. El hechizo otorga 120 {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}, que se divide entre los destinatarios del hechizo.

spells.name: Power Word Heal
entries: A wave of healing energy washes over one creature you can see within range. The target regains all its {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. If the creature has the {@condition Charmed|XPHB}, {@condition Frightened|XPHB}, {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB}, {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}, or {@condition Stunned|XPHB} condition, the condition ends. If the creature has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition, it can use its {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to stand up.
entries_es: Una ola de energía curativa lava sobre una criatura que puedes ver dentro del rango. El objetivo recupera todo {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. Si la criatura tiene {@condition Charmed|XPHB}, {@condition Frightened|XPHB}, {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB}], {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}, o [[TAG5] condición, la condición termina. Si la criatura tiene la condición [[TAG6], puede usar su {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} para ponerse de pie.

spells.name: Power Word Kill
entries: You compel one creature you can see within range to die. If the target has 100 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} or fewer, it dies. Otherwise, it takes {@damage 12d12} Psychic damage.
entries_es: Te obligas a una criatura que puedes ver dentro del rango a morir. Si el objetivo tiene 100 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} o menos, muere. De lo contrario, se necesita [[TAG1] daño psíquico.

spells.name: Power Word Stun
entries: You overwhelm the mind of one creature you can see within range. If the target has 150 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} or fewer, it has the {@condition Stunned|XPHB} condition. Otherwise, its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is 0 until the start of your next turn.
The {@condition Stunned|XPHB} target makes a Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the condition on itself on a success.
entries_es: Usted abruma la mente de una criatura que puede ver dentro del rango. Si el objetivo tiene 150 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} o menos, tiene la condición {@condition Stunned|XPHB}. De lo contrario, su {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} es 0 hasta el comienzo de su próximo turno.
El objetivo {@condition Stunned|XPHB} hace un lanzamiento de ahorro de la Constitución al final de cada uno de sus turnos, poniendo fin a la condición sobre sí mismo en un éxito.

spells.name: Prayer of Healing
entries: Up to five creatures of your choice who remain within range for the spell's entire casting gain the benefits of a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB} and also regain {@dice 2d8} {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. A creature can't be affected by this spell again until that creature finishes a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.
entries_es: Hasta cinco criaturas de su elección que permanecen dentro del rango para toda la fundición del hechizo ganan los beneficios de un {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB} y también recuperan {@dice 2d8} {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. Una criatura no puede ser afectada por este hechizo otra vez hasta que esa criatura termine un {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

spells.name: Prestidigitation
entries: You create a magical effect within range. Choose the effect from the options below. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its non-instantaneous effects active at a time.

entries.name: Sensory Effect
entries: You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as a shower of sparks, a puff of wind, faint musical notes, or an odd odor.
entries_es: Creas un efecto sensorial instantáneo e inofensivo, como una ducha de chispas, un soplo de viento, notas musicales débiles o un olor extraño.

entries.name: Fire Play
entries: You instantaneously light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire.
entries_es: Usted instantáneamente enciende una vela, una antorcha o una pequeña fogata.

entries.name: Clean or Soil
entries: You instantaneously clean or soil an object no larger than 1 cubic foot.
entries_es: Usted limpia instantáneamente o aterriza un objeto no más de 1 pie cúbico.

entries.name: Minor Sensation
entries: You chill, warm, or flavor up to 1 cubic foot of nonliving material for 1 hour.
entries_es: Usted fría, caliente o sabor hasta 1 pie cúbico de material no vivo durante 1 hora.

entries.name: Magic Mark
entries: You make a color, a small mark, or a symbol appear on an object or a surface for 1 hour.
entries_es: Haces un color, una marca pequeña o un símbolo aparecen en un objeto o una superficie durante 1 hora.

entries.name: Minor Creation
entries: You create a nonmagical trinket or an illusory image that can fit in your hand. It lasts until the end of your next turn. A trinket can deal no damage and has no monetary worth.
entries_es: Usted crea un trinket no mágico o una imagen ilusoria que puede caber en su mano. Dura hasta el final de tu próximo turno. Un trinket no puede hacer daño y no tiene valor monetario.

Creas un efecto mágico dentro del rango. Elija el efecto de las opciones a continuación. Si usted lanza este hechizo varias veces, puede tener hasta tres de sus efectos no instantaneos activos a la vez.

entries_es.name: Sensory Effect
entries: You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as a shower of sparks, a puff of wind, faint musical notes, or an odd odor.
entries_es: Creas un efecto sensorial instantáneo e inofensivo, como una ducha de chispas, un soplo de viento, notas musicales débiles o un olor extraño.

entries_es.name: Fire Play
entries: You instantaneously light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire.
entries_es: Usted instantáneamente enciende una vela, una antorcha o una pequeña fogata.

entries_es.name: Clean or Soil
entries: You instantaneously clean or soil an object no larger than 1 cubic foot.
entries_es: Usted limpia instantáneamente o aterriza un objeto no más de 1 pie cúbico.

entries_es.name: Minor Sensation
entries: You chill, warm, or flavor up to 1 cubic foot of nonliving material for 1 hour.
entries_es: Usted fría, caliente o sabor hasta 1 pie cúbico de material no vivo durante 1 hora.

entries_es.name: Magic Mark
entries: You make a color, a small mark, or a symbol appear on an object or a surface for 1 hour.
entries_es: Haces un color, una marca pequeña o un símbolo aparecen en un objeto o una superficie durante 1 hora.

entries_es.name: Minor Creation
entries: You create a nonmagical trinket or an illusory image that can fit in your hand. It lasts until the end of your next turn. A trinket can deal no damage and has no monetary worth.
entries_es: Usted crea un trinket no mágico o una imagen ilusoria que puede caber en su mano. Dura hasta el final de tu próximo turno. Un trinket no puede hacer daño y no tiene valor monetario.

spells.name: Prismatic Spray
entries: Eight rays of light flash from you in a 60-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. Each creature in the {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone} makes a Dexterity saving throw. For each target, roll {@dice 1d8} to determine which color ray affects it, consulting the Prismatic Rays table.

entries.caption: Prismatic Rays
rows: {@b Red.} {@i Failed Save:} {@damage 12d6} Fire damage. {@i Successful Save:} Half as much damage.
{@b Orange.} {@i Failed Save:} {@damage 12d6} Acid damage. {@i Successful Save:} Half as much damage.
{@b Yellow.} {@i Failed Save:} {@damage 12d6} Lightning damage. {@i Successful Save:} Half as much damage.
{@b Green.} {@i Failed Save:} {@damage 12d6} Poison damage. {@i Successful Save:} Half as much damage.
{@b Blue.} {@i Failed Save:} {@damage 12d6} Cold damage. {@i Successful Save:} Half as much damage.

{@b Indigo.} {@i Failed Save:} The target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and makes a Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If it successfully saves three times, the condition ends. If it fails three times, it has the {@condition Petrified|XPHB} condition until it is freed by an effect like the {@spell Greater Restoration|XPHB} spell. The successes and failures needn't be consecutive; keep track of both until the target collects three of a kind.

{@b Violet.} {@i Failed Save:} The target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition and makes a Wisdom saving throw at the start of your next turn. On a successful save, the condition ends. On a failed save, the condition ends, and the creature teleports to another plane of existence (DM's choice).
{@b Special.} The target is struck by two rays. Roll twice, rerolling any 8.

entries_es: Ocho rayos de luz flash de ti en un 60 pies {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. Cada criatura en el {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone} hace un lanzamiento de ahorro de Dexterity. Para cada objetivo, rodar {@dice 1d8} para determinar qué rayos de color lo afecta, consultando la tabla de Rayos Prismáticos.

entries_es.caption: Prismatic Rays
rows: {@b Red.} {@i Failed Save:} {@damage 12d6} Fire damage. {@i Successful Save:} Half as much damage.
{@b Orange.} {@i Failed Save:} {@damage 12d6} Acid damage. {@i Successful Save:} Half as much damage.
{@b Yellow.} {@i Failed Save:} {@damage 12d6} Lightning damage. {@i Successful Save:} Half as much damage.
{@b Green.} {@i Failed Save:} {@damage 12d6} Poison damage. {@i Successful Save:} Half as much damage.
{@b Blue.} {@i Failed Save:} {@damage 12d6} Cold damage. {@i Successful Save:} Half as much damage.

{@b Indigo.} {@i Failed Save:} The target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and makes a Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If it successfully saves three times, the condition ends. If it fails three times, it has the {@condition Petrified|XPHB} condition until it is freed by an effect like the {@spell Greater Restoration|XPHB} spell. The successes and failures needn't be consecutive; keep track of both until the target collects three of a kind.

{@b Violet.} {@i Failed Save:} The target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition and makes a Wisdom saving throw at the start of your next turn. On a successful save, the condition ends. On a failed save, the condition ends, and the creature teleports to another plane of existence (DM's choice).
{@b Special.} The target is struck by two rays. Roll twice, rerolling any 8.

spells.name: Prismatic Wall
entries: A shimmering, multicolored plane of light forms a vertical opaque wall—up to 90 feet long, 30 feet high, and 1 inch thick—centered on a point within range. Alternatively, you shape the wall into a globe up to 30 feet in diameter centered on a point within range. The wall lasts for the duration. If you position the wall in a space occupied by a creature, the spell ends instantly without effect.

The wall sheds {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB} within 100 feet and {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} for an additional 100 feet. You and creatures you designate when you cast the spell can pass through and be near the wall without harm. If another creature that can see the wall moves within 20 feet of it or starts its turn there, the creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or have the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition for 1 minute.

The wall consists of seven layers, each with a different color. When a creature reaches into or passes through the wall, it does so one layer at a time through all the layers. Each layer forces the creature to make a Dexterity saving throw or be affected by that layer's properties as described in the Prismatic Layers table.

The wall, which has AC 10, can be destroyed one layer at a time, in order from red to violet, by means specific to each layer. If a layer is destroyed, it is gone for the duration. {@spell Antimagic Field|XPHB} has no effect on the wall, and {@spell Dispel Magic|XPHB} can affect only the violet layer.

entries.caption: Prismatic Layers
rows: {@b Red.} {@i Failed Save:} {@damage 12d6} Fire damage. {@i Successful Save:} Half as much damage. {@i Additional Effects}: Nonmagical ranged attacks can't pass through this layer, which is destroyed if it takes at least 25 Cold damage.

{@b Orange.} {@i Failed Save:} {@damage 12d6} Acid damage. {@i Successful Save:} Half as much damage. {@i Additional Effects:} Magical ranged attacks can't pass through this layer, which is destroyed by a strong wind (such as the one created by {@spell Gust of Wind|XPHB}).
{@b Yellow.} {@i Failed Save:} {@damage 12d6} Lightning damage. {@i Successful Save:} Half as much damage. {@i Additional Effects:} The layer is destroyed if it takes at least 60 Force damage.

{@b Green.} {@i Failed Save:} {@damage 12d6} Poison damage. {@i Successful Save:} Half as much damage. {@i Additional Effects:} A {@spell Passwall|XPHB} spell, or another spell of equal or greater level that can open a portal on a solid surface, destroys this layer.
{@b Blue.} {@i Failed Save:} {@damage 12d6} Cold damage. {@i Successful Save:} Half as much damage. {@i Additional Effects:} The layer is destroyed if it takes at least 25 Fire damage.

{@b Indigo.} {@i Failed Save:} The target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and makes a Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If it successfully saves three times, the condition ends. If it fails three times, it has the {@condition Petrified|XPHB} condition until it is freed by an effect like the {@spell Greater Restoration|XPHB} spell. The successes and failures needn't be consecutive; keep track of both until the target collects three of a kind. {@i Additional Effects:} Spells can't be cast through this layer, which is destroyed by {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB} shed by the {@spell Daylight|XPHB} spell.

{@b Violet.} {@i Failed Save:} The target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition and makes a Wisdom saving throw at the start of your next turn. On a successful save, the condition ends. On a failed save, the condition ends, and the creature teleports to another plane of existence (DM's choice). {@i Additional Effects:} This layer is destroyed by {@spell Dispel Magic|XPHB}.

entries_es: Un plano de luz multicolor brillante forma una pared opaca vertical, de hasta 90 pies de largo, 30 pies de alto y 1 pulgada de espesor, centrada en un punto dentro del rango. Alternativamente, usted forma la pared en un globo hasta 30 pies de diámetro centrado en un punto dentro del rango. La pared dura toda la duración. Si colocas la pared en un espacio ocupado por una criatura, el hechizo termina instantáneamente sin efecto.

Los cobertores de la pared {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB} dentro de 100 pies y {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} por 100 pies adicionales. Ustedes y criaturas que designan cuando lanzan el hechizo pueden pasar y estar cerca de la pared sin daño. Si otra criatura que puede ver la pared se mueve a menos de 20 pies de ella o comienza su turno allí, la criatura debe tener éxito en un lanzamiento de la Constitución salvando o tener la condición {@condition Blinded|XPHB} por 1 minuto.

La pared consta de siete capas, cada una con un color diferente. Cuando una criatura entra o pasa por la pared, lo hace una capa a la vez a través de todas las capas. Cada capa obliga a la criatura a hacer un lanzamiento de ahorro de Dexteridad o ser afectada por las propiedades de esa capa como se describe en la tabla de capas prismáticas.

La pared, que tiene AC 10, puede ser destruida una capa a la vez, en orden de rojo a violeta, por medio específico a cada capa. Si una capa es destruida, se ha ido por la duración. {@spell Antimagic Field|XPHB} no tiene efecto en la pared, y {@spell Dispel Magic|XPHB} sólo puede afectar la capa violeta.

entries_es.caption: Prismatic Layers
rows: {@b Red.} {@i Failed Save:} {@damage 12d6} Fire damage. {@i Successful Save:} Half as much damage. {@i Additional Effects}: Nonmagical ranged attacks can't pass through this layer, which is destroyed if it takes at least 25 Cold damage.

{@b Orange.} {@i Failed Save:} {@damage 12d6} Acid damage. {@i Successful Save:} Half as much damage. {@i Additional Effects:} Magical ranged attacks can't pass through this layer, which is destroyed by a strong wind (such as the one created by {@spell Gust of Wind|XPHB}).
